#################################################

Release Name:
World.of.Goo.(2D.Boy.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: World of Goo
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
DirectX Version: 9.0c or above
Processor: Pentium 3 - 1GHz or better
RAM: 512MB
Video Card RAM: 64MB, 3D hardware acceleration required
Operating System: Windows XP or Vista
Hard Drive Space: 100 MB
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run World of Goo_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

World of Goo is an innovative puzzle game with realistic physics and construction, gorgeous animation, a clever story, and a heaping dose of tongue-in-cheek humor. Drag and drop living, squirming globs of goo to build towers, bridges and all sorts of other structures to help these adorable creatures navigate through their world. New chapters introduce new types of Goo, each type exhibiting different Gooey properties. The millions of Goo Balls that live in the beautiful World of Goo are filled with curiosity and the urge to explore...but don't realize they live in a game, or that they are extremely delicious to roving Goo predators.

Release Notes:

By default, this game is 800x600 resolution. However, you can modify the properties/config.txt to whatever resolution you desire, which I highly recommend.
